hero.subtitle: Connect with verified pet sitters, groomers, and dog walkers in your neighborhood

howItWorks.title: How It Works
howItWorks.subtitle: Finding trusted pet care has never been easier. Follow these simple steps.
howItWorks.step1Desc: Describe your pet and what kind of care you are looking for. It only takes 2 minutes.
howItWorks.step2Desc: We will connect you with up to 5 verified providers in your area within minutes.
howItWorks.step3Desc: Compare profiles, reviews, and prices. Book your favorite provider directly.
howItWorks.step4Desc: Receive real-time updates with photos and messages throughout your pet stay.
howItWorks.ctaSubtitle: No credit card required • Cancel anytime
howItWorks.noCardRequired: No credit card required • Cancel anytime

whyChooseUs.title: Everything Your Pet Needs
whyChooseUs.subtitle: The complete peace of mind solution for pet care, all in one place
whyChooseUs.benefit1Desc: Your pet stays in a loving home environment, not a kennel
whyChooseUs.benefit2Desc: All providers are background checked and fully insured
whyChooseUs.benefit3Desc: Receive photos and messages throughout your pet stay
whyChooseUs.benefit4Desc: Your reservation is 100% guaranteed with our protection policy
whyChooseUs.benefit5Desc: Chat directly with providers before and during the stay
whyChooseUs.benefit6Desc: Join thousands of happy pet parents who trust us

benefits.title: Rest easy knowing we got your back
benefits.item1Desc: Your payment is safe, secure and protected when you book with PetService. Cancel anytime with our flexible cancellation policy and get a full refund if your plans change.
benefits.item2Desc: Your pet safety is our priority. All bookings are covered by premium protection, ensuring peace of mind throughout your pet care journey.
benefits.item3Desc: Only 30% of applicants make the cut. We carefully vet all providers to ensure they meet our high standards. Learn more about how committed they are.

becomeProvider.title: Open for business.
becomeProvider.subtitle: Whatever pet service you provide, we will find the pet sitter, groomer or dog walker jobs you need.

locations.title: Use PetService in 50 Countries.
locations.subtitle: There is nothing worse than getting your hopes up, then not being able to find your pet sitter, groomer and walker. That will not happen on PetService. From big cities to small towns, we have got pet sitters and dog walkers covering every country in the world.

blog.title: Everything You Need: Tips, Tricks & News
blog.subtitle: Discover interesting tips, practical tricks and latest news about pet care.

appDownload.title: When you need to hire someone – a pet sitter, a groomer, a dog walker, anyone – PetService finds them for you for free.
appDownload.subtitle: See price estimates and read reviews with pet sitters, pet groomers, dog walkers, and see how far your dog has walked all in the Pet app.

faq.title: Got Questions?
faq.subtitle: We have got answers. Find everything you need to know about PetService.
faq.q1: How do I book a pet service?
faq.a1: Simply search for services near you, browse verified providers, read reviews, and book your preferred sitter or service. You can chat with providers before booking to ensure they are the right fit.
faq.a2: Yes! All providers undergo background checks and are fully insured. We verify their identity, experience, and qualifications before they can offer services on our platform.
faq.a3: We have 24/7 support and a comprehensive insurance policy covering all bookings. If any issues arise, contact our support team immediately and we will resolve it quickly.
faq.a4: Yes, you can cancel bookings according to our flexible cancellation policy. Free cancellation is available up to 24 hours before the service start time.
faq.q5: How do I become a provider?
faq.a5: Sign up as a provider, complete your profile, verify your identity, and start accepting bookings! We offer resources and support to help you succeed.
faq.a6: No! What you see is what you pay. There are no booking fees, hidden charges, or surprise costs. The price displayed is the final price.

trustBadges.title: We have Got You Covered
trustBadges.subtitle: Your peace of mind is our priority

aiChat.title: AI Assistant
aiChat.subtitle: Always here to help
aiChat.welcomeMessage:
Hello! I'm your AI assistant for the pet service marketplace. I can help you with:

• Finding and booking pet services
• Understanding how the platform works
• Answering questions about pet care
• Troubleshooting issues

What would you like to know?
aiChat.hint: Ask me anything about pet services
aiChat.errorMessage: I'm sorry, I'm having trouble responding right now. Please try again in a moment.
